title: 1999/8/EC: Council Decision of 31 December 1998 adopting the Statutes of the Economic and Financial Committee
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 31 December 1998 adopting the Statutes of the Economic and Financial Committee (1999/8/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The Statutes of the Economic and Financial Committee are hereby adopted.
The text of the Statutes is set out in the Annex hereto.

This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall take effect as from 1 January 1999.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 December 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. EDLINGER
(1) OJ L 358, 31. 12. 1998, p. 109.
(2) OJ C 236, 2. 8. 1997, p. 5.
